atk-s0403a8:2: 81. Catutthassa paṭhame rajanīyesūti rāgassa paccayesu ārammaṇesu. Sesesupi eseva nayo.
atk-s0403a8:4: 82. Dutiye makkhīti guṇamakkhako. Paḷāsīti yugaggāhalakkhaṇena paḷāsena samannāgato.
atk-s0403a8:6_0: 83. Tatiye kuhakoti tīhi kuhanavatthūhi samannāgato. Lapakoti lābhasannissitāya lapanāya
atk-s0403a8:6_1: samannāgato. Nemittikoti nimittakiriyakārako. Nippesikoti nippesanakatāya samannāgato.
atk-s0403a8:6_2: Lābhena ca lābhaṁ nijigīsitāti lābhena lābhagavesako. Sukkapakkho vuttavipallāsavasena
atk-s0403a8:8: 85. Pañcame akkhamo hoti rūpānanti rūpārammaṇānaṁ anadhivāsako hoti, tadārammaṇehi rāgādīhi abhibhuyyati. Eseva nayo sabbattha.
atk-s0403a8:10_0: 86. Chaṭṭhe atthapaṭisambhidāppattoti pañcasu atthesu pabhedagataṁ ñāṇaṁ patto. Dhammapaṭisambhidāppattoti
atk-s0403a8:10_1: catubbidhe dhamme pabhedagataṁ ñāṇaṁ patto. Niruttipaṭisambhidāppattoti dhammaniruttīsu
atk-s0403a8:10_2: pabhedagataṁ ñāṇaṁ patto. Paṭibhānapaṭisambhidāppattoti tesu tīsu ñāṇesu pabhedagataṁ
atk-s0403a8:10_3: ñāṇaṁ patto. So pana tāni tīṇi ñāṇāneva jānāti, na tesaṁ kiccaṁ karoti. Uccāvacānīti
atk-s0403a8:12_0: 87. Sattamaṁ uttānatthameva. Sīlaṁ panettha khīṇāsavasīlameva, bāhusaccampi khīṇāsavabāhusaccameva,
atk-s0403a8:12_1: vācāpi khīṇāsavassa kalyāṇavācāva, jhānānipi kiriyajjhānāneva kathitānīti veditabbāni.
atk-s0403a8:14_0: 88. Aṭṭhame theroti thirabhāvappatto. Rattaññūti pabbajitadivasato paṭṭhāya atikkantānaṁ
atk-s0403a8:14_1: bahūnaṁ rattīnaṁ ñātā. Ñātoti paññāto pākaṭo. Yasassīti yasanissito. Micchādiṭṭhikoti
atk-s0403a8:16_0: 89. Navame sekhassāti sikkhakassa sakaraṇīyassa. Parihānāyāti upariguṇehi parihānatthāya.
atk-s0403a8:16_1: Kammārāmatāti navakamme ramanakabhāvo. Bhassārāmatāti ālāpasallāpe ramanakabhāvo.
atk-s0403a8:16_2: Niddārāmatāti niddāyane ramanakabhāvo. Saṅgaṇikārāmatāti gaṇasaṅgaṇikāya ramanakabhāvo.
atk-s0403a8:16_3: Yathāvimuttaṁ cittaṁ na paccavekkhatīti yathā yaṁ cittaṁ vimuttaṁ, ye ca dosā pahīnā,
atk-s0403a8:16_4: guṇā ca paṭiladdhā, te paccavekkhitvā upariguṇapaṭilābhāya vāyāmaṁ na karotīti attho.
atk-s0403a8:16_5: Iti imasmiṁ sutte sattannaṁ sekhānaṁ upariguṇehi parihānikāraṇañca vuddhikāraṇañca
atk-s0403a8:16_6: kathitaṁ. Yañca nāma sekhassa parihānakāraṇaṁ, taṁ puthujjanassa paṭhamameva hotīti.
atk-s0403a8:18_0: 90. Dasame viyattoti byatto cheko. Kiṁkaraṇīyesūti iti kattabbesu. Cetosamathanti
atk-s0403a8:18_1: samādhikammaṭṭhānaṁ. Ananulomikenāti sāsanassa ananucchavikena. Atikālenāti atipātova.
atk-s0403a8:18_2: Atidivāti divā vuccati majjhanhiko, taṁ atikkamitvā. Ābhisallekhikāti ativiya kilesasallekhikā.
atk-s0403a8:18_4: appicchā hothāti kathanakathā. Santuṭṭhikathāti catūhi paccayehi santuṭṭhā hothāti
atk-s0403a8:18_5: kathanakathā. Pavivekakathāti tīhi vivekehi vivittā hothāti kathanakathā. Asaṁsaggakathāti
atk-s0403a8:18_6: pañcavidhena saṁsaggena asaṁsaṭṭhā hothāti kathanakathā. Vīriyārambhakathāti duvidhaṁ
atk-s0403a8:18_7: vīriyaṁ ārabhathāti kathanakathā. Sīlakathādīsu sīlaṁ ārabbha kathā sīlakathā. Samādhiṁ
atk-s0403a8:18_8: ārabbha, paññaṁ ārabbha, pañcavidhaṁ vimuttiṁ ārabbha, ekūnavīsatipaccavekkhaṇasaṅkhātaṁ
atk-s0403a8:18_9: vimuttiñāṇadassanaṁ ārabbha kathā vimuttiñāṇadassanakathā. Na nikāmalābhītiādīsu
atk-s0403a8:18_10: na icchiticchitalābhī, dukkhalābhī na vipulalābhīti attho. Sesaṁ uttānatthamevāti.
